Headline: #51 51st Temporary Westbound Reroute near Wentworth/51st
ShortDescription: Westbound 51 51st  buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, State, 47th and Redline: due to, street blockage near Wentworth/51st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
